Html:
Hello Wsus Package Publish-ChiefÂ´s,

i used Wsus Package Publisher a long time ago and now god the first error.
I think there is an error during the download from Adobe Flash Player 18.0.0.160.
Error Message: "The path has an invalid format"

Here are the Steps i did:
  • Import from Catalog
  • Open Catalog Adobe Flash Player
  • Select Flash Player 18.0.0.160
  • Import Selected Updates
  • Import From Catalog.. in process
  • Pop-Up-Error: "The path has an invalid format"
After the message pops up i choose the "OK"-Button for sending Error-Informations and afterwards Wsus package Publisher closed automaticaly.

So far, the update with older Adobe Flash Player versions has always worked.

I tried to download Wsus package Publisher again and import the catalog again but same problem again.

Could you help me?

http://www.bilder-upload.eu/show.php?file=660e91-1435057039.jpg

Best Regards
